# Credits

## Inspiration

- [VA-11 Hall-A](https://waifubartending.com/) by Sukeban Games — theme, personality, and aesthetic

## Art

- [Eder Muniz](https://edermunizz.itch.io/) — banner background
- [CyberpunkWaifus](https://github.com/tokamach/newtab) — banner font
- [@kiririn51](https://x.com/kiririn51) — social preview art

## Built With

- [Discord.py](https://github.com/Rapptz/discord.py) — bot framework
- [Mafic](https://github.com/ooliver1/mafic) — Lavalink client
- [Lavalink](https://github.com/lavalink-devs/Lavalink) — audio server
- [Claude](https://claude.ai/) — did the typing
